channel.title: [317]help with with adding items in shops[317]
channel.description: hey. help plz :confused: :confused:... i need help 2 add items into my shops.. heres the problem tell me if im doing anything wrong. step1:i did this open up source file and click shops. got the code from 508 item database put it in and the amount step2:i compiled it and it said succesfull. step3:i logged onto my server and the sreen is black and when u type ur name comes up as null.. what happened.. if yu no plz tell.. and also how 2 put items in my shops safley :eek:

item.title: [317]help with with adding items in shops[317]
item.dc:creator: @arthur323 arthur323
item.description:
@arthur323 wrote:

  1. Create a backup before doing shut.

Delet everything u addrent

to make it it;ll be like

example

35    100

Means 35 is ags 100 per of them so 100 of ags’s in shop.
To make it click “TAB” not space.

Read full topic
item.source: [317]help with with adding items in shops[317]

item.title: [317]help with with adding items in shops[317]
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

[quote=“bigballers, post:5, topic:296476”][quote author=chicken liver link=topic=392470.msg2922061#msg2922061 date=1250813372]
good question is that why???[quote author=Epic Ancient link=topic=392470.msg2922058#msg2922058 date=1250813325]
If you’re running a 317, why did you get the code from the 508 database? :s
[/quote]
[/quote]

Download a shop maker… (One is in Allstarscape)[/quote]

Nope. I use allstarscapev2 source, and it’s not there.
You can google it, or search (on the forums here) zodiac’s id & tools list pack 3.0

I downloaded his Pack to get a shopmaker, though it’s of no use because it has a minor flaw.

Read full topic
